price: 55. en dehors de Lui. Complotez donc tous contre moi et ne me laissez aucun répit.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
